title: Adversarial Learning
description: We have an article embedding which encodes, in particular, the type of fabric, season, targeted gender and age, the color as well as the brand of a fashion item: Fashion DNA. Via adversarial learning, we trained a model on top of Fashion DNA with the task to forget all article properties except for color and pattern. Examples of neighborhoods with respect to the resulting article embedding are shown below.
